long_description:
= DESCRIPTION:

RightLink test suite.  

Functional test suite for the the RightLink project.

http://wiki.github.com/rightscale/right_link/

= REQUIREMENTS:

= ATTRIBUTES: 
none

= USAGE:
name: rightlink_test

recipes.rightlink_test::state_test_check_value: Verifies attribute setup in state_test_setup was persisted. This should be run as an operational script.
recipes.rightlink_test::resource_remote_recipe_p: Called by resource_remote_recipe_test_start -- Add as a operational script.
recipes.rightlink_test::tag_break_point_test: Add a breakpoint at tag_break_point_test_should_never_run recipe and reboots server.
recipes.rightlink_test::core_env_test: Verifies all require rightscale environment variables are available in the Chef node.
recipes.rightlink_test::tag_break_point_test_sho: Used by tag_break_point_test. This must be the last boot script in your template.
recipes.rightlink_test::resource_remote_recipe_t: Starts the remote_recipe 'ping-pong' test.  This must be run as an operational script (or you will get stuck in an endless loop)
recipes.rightlink_test::persist_test_setup: Persists a resource to file for use in a separate converge. This can be boot or op script.
recipes.rightlink_test::persist_test_check: Verifies resource created in persist_test_setup was persisted. This should be run as an operational script.
recipes.rightlink_test::ohai_plugin_test: Verifies all custom ohai plugin values are available in the Chef node.
recipes.rightlink_test::resource_server_collecti: Tests the ability to query tags on the local server.
recipes.rightlink_test::resource_remote_recipe_p: Called by resource_remote_recipe_test_start -- Add as a operational script.
recipes.rightlink_test::state_test_setup: Overwrites default attribute the first time run. This can be boot or op script.
recipes.rightlink_test::resource_right_link_tag_: Test the ability to add and remove tags.
recipes.rightlink_test::tag_cookbook_path_test: Copies this repo to a local dir, sets the cookbook_path tag, and reboots server.
recipes.rightlink_test::resource_remote_recipe_s: Tags a server as a ping receiver.  Any server with this tag needs resource_remote_recipe_ping & resource_remote_recipe_pong as operational scripts.
recipes.rightlink_test::ruby_warning_test: Generate a ruby warning. Recipe should not fail.  Recommend running as boot script.
